function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate housing, poor sanitation, and waste management in urban areas","Impact":"Increased transmission of vector-borne diseases (VBDs) such as malaria, dengue fever, Zika, and Ebola","Mitigation":"Improving access to equitable infrastructure, upgrading informal settlements, and implementing proper waste management","Technologies":"Sanitation systems, waste treatment facilities, urban planning tools","People":"Urban population in developing countries","Owner":"Governments, urban planners, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Air quality failing WHO guidelines in urban areas","Impact":"Higher risk of respiratory diseases and other health issues","Mitigation":"Implementing air quality monitoring and improvement measures, reducing emissions, and promoting clean energy sources","Technologies":"Air quality monitors, emission control technology, renewable energy solutions","People":"Urban population, especially those living in areas with poor air quality","Owner":"Environmental agencies, governments, city authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of specific actions in the NUA regarding health and the built environment","Impact":"Inadequate measures to improve urban health conditions and reduce disease transmission","Mitigation":"Developing specific and actionable strategies to address health and the built environment, incorporating health considerations into urban planning and development","Technologies":"Integrated urban health planning tools, data analytics for health impact assessment, health-focused urban design frameworks","People":"Professionals involved in city design, planning, and governance","Owner":"Global health organizations, urban development agencies, city governments"}]}
